roleset.name: cause to be more difficult, involved

role.descr: agent, entity causing something to become complicated
complication itself, if in addition to ARG0

example.name: complicate-v: transitive
example.text: Cray Research 's decision to link its $ 98.3 million promissory note to Mr. Cray 's presence will complicate a valuation of the new company .

propbank.arg: Cray Research 's decision to link its $ 98.3 million promissory note to Mr. Cray 's presence
a valuation of the new company

example.name: complicate-v: with benefactive
example.text: [The new round of bidding]-1 would seem *trace*-1 to complicate the decision making for Judge James Yacos .

example.name: complication-n: Args 0 & 1
example.text: His unnecessary complication of the explanation only confused the students .

example.name: complication-n: Non-agentive complicator
example.text: The new experimental data 's complication of the existing theory can not be dismissed .

example.name: complication-n: Medical, complicator as 'from' PP
example.text: He died of complications from the surgery .

example.name: complicated-j: Arg 1 only
example.text: It 's complicated , I 'll grant you that .

example.name: complicate-v: All args
example.text: The position is complicated for me by the fact that I really began to write novels , not out of any spiritual urgency , but in order to earn money .

propbank.arg: by the fact that I really began to write novels , not out of any spiritual urgency , but in order to earn money

example.name: complication-n
example.text: Ms . Miller was hospitalized on October 29 , 2009 , with complications of diverticulitis requiring IV antibiotics .
example.amr: (h / hospitalize-01 :ARG1 (p / person :name (n / name :op1 "Ms." :op2 "Miller")) :time (d / date-entity :month 10 :day 29 :year 2009) :ARG1-of (c / cause-01 :ARG0 (t / thing :pl + :ARG3-of (c2 / complicate-01 :ARG0 (d / disease-disorder :name (n2 / name :op1 "diverticulitis") :ARG2-of (h / have-disorder-91 :ARG1 p))) :ARG0-of (r / require-01 :ARG1 (m / medications-drugs :name (n3 / name :op1 "antibiotics") :path (d2 / devices :name (n4 / name :op1 "IV")))))))

roleset.note: COMPLICATE NOTES: Arg2 added for THYME-AMR.
COMPLICATE-V NOTES: Be careful for adjectival "complicated" usages confused with verbal"complicated" usages. (from complicate.01-v)
COMPLICATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry complicate.01, OntoNotes grouping complication-n senses 1-3; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from complication.01-n)
COMPLICATED-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from complicated.01-j)
